_description: A fragment of a lullaby — four lines (very faded)

BLRoy20Ai.Transcription:
Werede ye fede & ye chelleth fyndeIn fayth wyth owtenne a
                    babyy buffed y billed y loffid y lappedy led in clos
BLRoy20Ai.Editions:
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 329; 1977, 305.
